model.Strategy.IUpdateStrategy

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MultiStrategy
      this class is used when combine two strategy there are two variants

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Methods in model that return IUpdateStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IUpdateStrategy BallModel.getSwitcherStrategy()
      make a default SwithcherStrategy ball
      private IUpdateStrategy BallModel.loadStrategy(java.lang.String className)
      Part if the following code in the loadBall(String) function is derived from "https://www.clear.rice.edu/comp310/JavaResources/dynamic_class_load.html", which accords with the homework instruction The following method returns an IUpdateStrategy, given a fully qualified class name (package.classname) of a subclass of ABall.
      Methods in model with parameters of type IUpdateStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BallModel.makeballs(IUpdateStrategy s1, IPaintStrategy p1)
      This method add an ABall loaded by the loadBall method to the dispatcher
      void BallModel.SetSwitcherStrategy(IUpdateStrategy strategy)
      this function will switch a ball to a new state

      Classes in model.Strategy that implement IUpdateStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AngryShakingStrategy
      this class will create a AngryShakingball on the basis of a default one
      class  BreathingStrategy
      this class will create a Breathingball on the basis of a default one
      class  ColorStrategy
      this class will create a colorball on the basis of a default one
      class  CurveStrategy
      this class will create a curve ball the updateState function will change the velocity of a default ball
      class  StraightStrategy
      default strategy
      class  SwitcherStrategy
      this class will make a SwitcherStrategy ball
      class  WanderStrategy
      this class implements IUpdateStrategy and create a wander ball
